# Wardens, welcome to the Arena.

## The home for Web3 security experts.

## A day in the life of a Code4rena Warden.

To have a secure ecosystem, there is a collective need for the services of
security and auditing experts. That's where you Wardens come in to save the
day (and get rewarded for doing so!).

  * Step 1: Audit Code.
  * Step 2: Identify Vulnerablilities.
  * Step 3: Get Paid.
  * Step 4: Climb the [Leaderboard.](/leaderboard)

## Ready to showcase your skills?

Code4rena Profiles are a solo auditor's highlight reel.

### Booking solo audits has never been easier. 🤝

Projects can now book a solo audit with you directly from your profile. This
feature (combined with the Code4rena team's administrative assistance) makes
booking solo audits easy, allowing you to focus on what you're best at:
auditing code.

### Every stat, all in one place. 📈

Want to keep track of your individual performance and leaderboard rankings?
The metrics bar in your Code4rena Profile does just that.

### All fired up. 🔥

We know some of you are more visually minded than others, which is why there's
a toggle-able option to view your performance in a visual heat map.

### It's like Twitter but for your auditing. 📣

Every audit you participate in, and every finding you make, all in a tidy,
chronological activity stream.

### Shine where shine is due. ✨

Sometimes there's a finding that you're super proud of, and CodeArena
encourages that. With the ability to highlight specific findings, you can
bring your best work to the front of the stage.

### For a more in-depth overview of Code4rena Profiles,  
visit this [blog](https://medium.com/code4rena/code4rena-profiles-a-solo-
auditors-highlight-reel-c4174946e388).
